subject: Barrister J. Williams LLP
body:
Barrister J. Williams LLP
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House,
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way,
Central Business District,
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria
VERY IMPORTANT MASSAGE FOR YOU
Dear Brother  
How are you today? i hope not bad.
This to let you that Mrs Derrick is dead, she died 3 days ago, some
how the change of ownership of her assets are partly in your name
though not fully.
I am sending you this message because i want us to work as team with
agreement to realize the final conclusion of this funds and assets. If
you agree with me as a lawyer that i am, i know what can be done in
good time to make this fund be ours. If you accept, we can easily get
the funds in your name fully and make transfer to your nominated
account, but it must be shared on the basis of 50/50. Lucky enough she
gave me documents to her Estate which is worth over $3million US
Dollars.
Let me hear what you have to say about this. Whatever decision you
want to make must be fast and urgent. Please re confirm your full
details
(1) Your full Name.......
(2) home address......
(3) telephone Number/ occupation for more information .
Regards
Barrister J. Williams LLP
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House,
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way,
Central Business District,
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria

subject: Re:   Barrister J. Williams LLP
body:
Dear Barrister J. Williams,

I'm sorry to hear about Mrs. Derrick's passing. However, I must admit that I am quite surprised by your message as I had no prior knowledge of any assets being in my name.

Before we proceed, could you please provide more details about these assets and how they came to be partly in my name? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the funds being ours"? 

As for my personal details, I would prefer to share them once I have a better understanding of the situation at hand.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kevin
